title: Disaster Movie
summary: Disaster Movie follows the comic misadventures of a group of ridiculously attractive twenty-somethings during one fateful night as they try to make their way to safety while every known natural disaster and catastrophic event - asteroids, twisters, earthquakes, the works – hits the city and their path as they try to solve a series ofDisaster Movie follows the comic misadventures of a group of ridiculously attractive twenty-somethings during one fateful night as they try to make their way to safety while every known natural disaster and catastrophic event - asteroids, twisters, earthquakes, the works – hits the city and their path as they try to solve a series of mysteries to end the rampant destruction. (Lionsgate)… Expand
critic_reviews: The movie is merciless sending up "Juno's" self-satisfied hipster gobbledygook, and it's quite funny to see Hannah Montana still promoting her tie-in products as she lies crushed and dying under a meteor.
The product's not 100% giggle-free: Several songs have amusing lyrics, especially parodies of "Juno" and "High School Musical."
Lazy, superficially au courant and utterly forgettable.
Seldom has a pic been more appropriately titled than Disaster Movie, yet another frantically unfunny free-form farce.
Real disaster movies have more laughs than this spoof.
Why would you watch a bad movie about better movies, when you could just rent the originals instead?
Does little more than congratulate its audience on recognizing the source of its riffs. "High School Musical" -- ha ha ha!
A horrific waste of time, money and oxygen.
It's too easy to say Disaster Movie deserves its title, but why put more effort into trashing it than the filmmakers did into writing it?
This carpet-fouling mongrel of a movie no more deserves release than do anthrax spores.
There's no nice way to say this, so I'll just say it: Writer/directors Friedberg and Seltzer are a scourge.

reviews.content: I thought this movie was funny at first, but consider this: It was 3:00 am i was tired. Honestly i can sit with a strait face and almost completely pissed at Friedberg and Seltzer. What crap.
um, this movie may be funny, but it has some disgusting moments like the cat pooping in the toilet. very stupid of those retards.
The title says it all. "Disaster Movie". At total waste of time and money. Take a pass on this one....terrible from beginning to end.

After years of seeing classics such as Battleship Pometkin and citizen Kane, along came 'Disaster Movie' to take the crown. A movie of such swag i cried myself to sleep, yet a heartfelt comedic undertone to keep the balance and  real messageAfter years of seeing classics such as Battleship Pometkin and citizen Kane, along came 'Disaster Movie' to take the crown. A movie of such swag i cried myself to sleep, yet a heartfelt comedic undertone to keep the balance and  real message of post modernism, racism, feminism, and anti semtic themes. 'Disaster Movie' swept me off my feet and still does to this day.

Normally I wouldn't criticise a film I had never seen, but Friedberg and Setzer waived that right after Epic Movie. No way am I paying for this crap again. I saw an ad in the paper for this film and there was a group shot of 20 Normally I wouldn't criticise a film I had never seen, but Friedberg and Setzer waived that right after Epic Movie. No way am I paying for this crap again. I saw an ad in the paper for this film and there was a group shot of 20 characters. Not a single one of them was from a disaster film, which automatically tells me that this film sucks. How are Hellboy, Iron Man, Incredible Hulk, Juno, High School Musical, Kung Fu Panda etc. disaster films? Shouldn't a film called Disaster Movie involve, oh I don't know, some kind of disaster movie parodies? You'd have to be stupid to not see how ripe that genre is for parody... well, I guess this is Frienderg and Setzer we are talking about. Also, the fact that these no-talent hacks would try to rip off films such as Hellboy, Iron Man and Kung Fu Panda, ie. REAL films made by TALENTED people, is like spitting in the face of anyone who has ever made or watched an enjoyable movie. I think the Razzies should be renamed the Friedberg/Setzer Awards, because they are clearly the people/things who personify the worst aspects of the film industry better than anyone else.
I left the theater during Amy Winehouse's long burping scene....which was at the beginning.

I know I'm being redundant but this movie is the anti-goodness. Aaron Seltzer and Jason Friedberg have reached a level of incompetence I thought only attainable by Uwe Boll. They are hacks that have no business making movies. There isn't a single funny or redeeming "joke" in this movie I use the word joke loosely as i don't think anything here qualifies as a joke. Their idea of humor is to recreate that annoying AT&T cell phone commercial and replace one of the words with fuck or to make D-list celebrity jokes that have been stale for years and aren't even relevant. There is one point where a guy who is supposed to be Michael Jackson but doesn't look anything like him appears out of the trunk of Speed Racer's car with Spridel and the monkey. Genius satire right? Bottom line:This is the worst movie I have ever seen, it's worse than plan 9 from outer space avoid this like the Bubonic Plague

This is one of the most spiteful, mean-spirited, lazy, disgusting, terrible, and wasteful movies I have ever had the misfortune of seeing. The movie recycles jokes like the cat pooping in the toilet and Michael Jackson being a pedophile that were in Friedberg and Seltzer's past movies. The fact that this movie craps all over much better films that WEREN'T EVEN OUT YET when this was released; and turns these movies into mindless fart, dick, and poop jokes is so tasteless and insulting that it makes me angry. Easily one of the worst movies I have ever seen.
